content:
Whether it's dealing with chaos or building Astralinks,
Loomi Co. has truly put their heart and soul into
developing each world bubble... *smiles warmly*

The bubbles of other worlds seem to be just around the corner.
Perhaps they're not as far from us as we think?

I've already <color=#97c344>got the tent</color> from Glenn,
they've been really thorough with the preparations.

We just made it through the turbulence to get here,
but look up at the sky...
